text: he kitabavala'o! Ni:Sanka amaro payagambara tamari pase payagambarona avataranani eka muddata pachi avi pahoncyo che, je tamara mate spasta varnana kari rahyo che, jethi tamari e vata na rahi jaya ke amari pase to ko'i bhala'i, bura'i sambhalavanara avyo ja nathi, basa! Have to kharekhara khusakhabara sambhalavanara ane saceta karanara avi pahoncyo ane allaha ta'ala dareka vastu para sakti dharave che
